home.description: Passionate about front-end development! With 5+ years of experience, Dedicating myself every day to transform ideas into code. Continuously sharpening my skills to tackle complex UI.

company_stefanini.title: Stefanini | Farol Cielo
company_stefanini.description: Responsible for Front end development in 3 web projects inside the client.Applications are developed using Angularjs, Angular 8/11. The main goal of the applications are monetazing customers data by showing charts and summing up his sells informations

company_ibm.title: IBM | Portal Santander
company_ibm.description: Responsável pelo desenvolvimento Front end em 3 projetos  dentro do cliente. As aplicaçóes são desenvolvidas utilizando Angularjs, Angular 8/11. O principal objetivo das aplicações é monetizar os dados dos clientes, mostrando gráficos e resumindo suas informações de vendas
